episodes.title: MLM Cult Tactics Revealed: Life Activated Brands Breakdown (Brandon Hayes Analysis)
episodes.description:
Autistic MLM dropout DeeCee dissects Brandon Hayes’ “motivational” transcript to expose predatory tactics at Life Activated Brands.

*Key Moments*
🔍 Love-bombing
🚩 Exponential scam math
⛪ Spiritual gaslighting 
📲 Tag-your-friends men’s vitality exploitation
💸 False urgency

This video analyzes Brandon Hayes’ MLM playbook, including cult tactics like manufactured urgency, spiritual manipulation, and blame-shifting. We break down how Life Activated Brands uses fake pep talks, recruitment pyramids, and pseudoscientific claims to exploit vulnerable communities. FTC data reveals 99% of MLM participants lose money – we explain why Hayes’ “elephant metaphor” and “ignorance on fire” rhetoric mask a rigged system.

⚠️ Protect neurodivergent and vulnerable communities: Subscribe for weekly MLM takedowns.
💬 Comment: “🚫🐘” if you’ve encountered Hayes’ tactics.

Links
📉 *FTC MLM Income Disclosure Report:* https://www.ftc.gov/system/files/ftc_gov/pdf/mlm-ids-report.pdf
🔗 *Full Anti-MLM Playlist:*

*Disclaimers*
This video critiques business practices, not individuals. Not sponsored or affiliated.
